content.value:
The house is in the historic center of the city where you will find a friendly, warm and welcoming atmosphere with all the comfort you deserve to make you feel at home.

We want that at the moment of your arrival you begin to enjoy the charm of this country, and that is why we invite you to enjoy in our Hostel the best hot chocolate with almojabana and cheese a traditional dish in the afternoons of these beautiful city.

We are not a party hostel but you will find here a calm, chilly atmosphere. The hostel is located in a quiet street still very close to everything you need: sights, shops, universities, facilities and services (see details below).

Towels are included, hot water 24 hours and Colombian coffee free all day. We have a tv room, a patio and a fully equiped kitchen free of use (freezer, microwave, mixer, plenty of pans and pots, etc) , free WiFi.
We offer Private rooms with private or shared bathroom, or Shared rooms. Each room offers wide beds furnished with good quality matresses and pillows, plus large lockers.

Our staff speak spanish and english, and will be happy to guide you to discover Bogota and Colombia, 24h ready to help.
